input.sentences: we all decided to get together .
my friends and i are so close .
we got a beach house on the lake .
there was even a party tonight .
some more of our close friends even showed up !
output.sentences: The group decided to start their party with a silly photo in the tub.
Photos continued as close friends arrived.
It was the perfect beach house on the lake for a evening of fun.
The guests cam ready to party tonight.
They had a blast dancing with their close friends.
